description:
Welcome home to the pigsty! Nagomi just started a job at the pig-themed Oinky Doink maid café, and she couldn’t be happier. But the other newbie, Ranko, is a little… odd.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Buhire! Kyou kara Akiba no Shinjin Maid!
Hi hi ! Une nouvelle maid à Akiba !
Oink It Up! Starting Today, You`re an Akiba Maid!
ブヒれ! 今日からアキバの新人メイド!
